name: AutoVoice
0:
”Alexa ask AutoVoice to say hello”
”Alexa ask autovoice to turn on my lights”
”Alexa ask autovoice to play a movie”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: auto voice
des:
If you install the AutoVoice Android app and Tasker you'll be able to do anything you want with your Amazon Echo. 

Suddenly there's no more stuff that it doesn't understand because you can just make it understand anything you want. :) 

Download the Android app here and let the unlimited voice control fun begin! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.joaomgcd.autovoice
